briefTitle: Sardine-enriched Diet for Prevention Type 2 Diabetes
officialTitle: Sardine-enriched Diet for Prevention Type 2 Diabetes in Elderly and Prediabetic Population

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* glycaemia between 100-125 md / dL or â‰¥5.7% HbA1c

Exclusion Criteria:

* treatment with oral antidiabetic drugs
* any nutritional education to prevent T2D
* Suspect or known hypersensitivity to sardine or related fish
* Chronic treatment with oral steroids and / or AINES
* Treatment with oral antidiabetic agents and / or insulin
* Treatment with immunosuppressive drugs
* Diagnosis of active neoplasm
* Diagnosis of HIV or AIDS
* Abnormal liver profile (\> 6 times normal values)
* Diagnosis of Acute Psychiatric Sdr
* Presence of serious acute concomitant disease, which it requires more than 7 days of recovery.
* Major cardiovascular event (stroke, myocardial infarction) in the month prior to randomization.
* Any other condition that the investigator considers to be inoperative so that the subject conducts the study.

primary.description: incidence of new diagnosis of type 2 diabetes

secondary.description: relative expression related genes by RT q-PCR (Real Time Quantitative Reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction)

secondary.measure: metabolomics study of dietary biomarkers and health biomarkers [(1) Fatty acyls, bile acids, steroids and lysoglycerophospholipids, (2) Glycerolipids, glycerophospholipids, sterol lipids and sphingolipids, (3) Amino acids.]
secondary.description: endogenous metabolic profiles of serum samples will be studied using ultra-high performance liquid chromatography - mass spectrometry (UHPLC-MS). The same unit for measurements \[log2 (fold change)\]

secondary.measure: HOMA-B (homeostasis model assessment B cell function)
